features: Ergonomic fit: Pre-shaped to fit and support the body in motion
Elastic waist with drawstring: Secures fit
Seamless inner leg: Reduces bulkiness and excess material that causes saddle bunching
Aero Lazer band at thigh: Lazer-cut, smooth transition to improve aerodynamics and muscle support
Ischial relief zone:  Relieves presssure at the back of the leg
Flatlock seams: Eliminate irritation and reduce chafing
Back and bottom reflective accents: Enhance visibility
